channel.title: My new banner! what do you think?

item.title: My new banner! what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3 runescape3
item.description:
@runescape3 wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:12, topic:153583”][quote author=runescape3 link=topic=209909.msg1839349#msg1839349 date=1193074876]
thanks dave, and thats a mean thing to say, what are you on (on my part because thats like saying it completely sucks after all that hard work) by the way, it looks fine in my opinion.
[/quote]
Well, if you can’t handle killer’s way of critiquing your work, then why post your work here? You should expect someone to point out the bad things. Only a retard would actually expect everyone to give them a 10/10 or whatever. The only way you learn is by having other people point out what could be fixed, and that’s what killer was doing.[/quote] i know, and you have a good point. i just meant saying are you on somthing (such as drugs) i don’t know, it just really pushed my buttons.

Read full topic

item.title: My new banner! what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I think it’s mediocre. The font is a horrible choice. The background looks contemporary, yet the font is from the BC era? Come on. The solid red with glow isn’t cutting it either.

item.title: My new banner! what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:15, topic:153583”][quote author=nator123123 link=topic=209909.msg1841727#msg1841727 date=1193259019]
it doesn’t look horrible for a banner, but it was a sig, it would suck.
Looks like 5 things :
Bluish background;
Input C4D;
Insert black stripe;
Insert Text;

There are about 2 more things wrong, but I can’t quite pick it up.
[/quote]Signature is the exact same thing as a banner, except one is dominate in one area. In no way does making it smaller to fit in a signatures spot, would it look worse nor better.
You should really stfu sometimes, you don’t even know what your talking about.[/quote]

that goes right in my “exe626’s flames” page. Congratulations! you have made the 1,038,913th flame.
You should stfu as well, bitch.

Your fave topic is flaming me huh?
I have not heard one thing about me that you said that was not a flame.
Bitch.
[center] You and exe fight like a married couple, although you were the only one I just saw cussing at the other.[/center]

Read full topic
